text: visvasigale, nim'ma sabhegalalli vaisalyavannu palisirendu nim'modane helaladaga vaisalyavannu palisiri. Allahanu nimage vaisalyavannu daya palisuvanu. Nim'modane eddu nillalu helaladaga eddu nilliri. Allahanu nim'mallina visvasigalige aunnatyavannu niduvanu mattu jnanigalige unnata sthanagalannu niduvanu. Allahanige nivu maduva ella karmagala arivide
